pageContext.claim: “They talk about glitches. How many glitches did they find? A glitch, oh gee, we had a glitch, 5,000 votes. In all cases, right? In all cases, the votes went from Trump to Biden.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Trump is talking about a documented case of human error which was quickly caught -- and would have been found during the county canvass process when certifying vote. The machine count was later confirmed] by a hand count.
